attributes.action: Increase the number of residential placements for disabled people under the age of 65
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government has decreased/removed the number of residential care home placements for people under the age of 65. This means that very ill "young" people are being placed in unsuitable homes full of old people with totally different illnesses and diseases.
For example - man aged 59 with chronic MS was placed in a home with geriatrics. he was the youngest resident and had no one to interact with.
